title: Q: 'These People Should Be Hanging' - (Video)
text:
By N. Morgan
Wednesday, January 24, 2018 4:08
 
Q has released several new posts over the last 48 hours, which are again hitting the bulls eye.
According to Q, these explosive info releases could be the start of the second American Revolution.
Q will begin releasing information about the elite’s involvement in child sex abuse and child trafficking.
The Elite’s house of cards is crumbling. All sides are being exposed to the light. 
The video report below is courtesy of  SGT Report .
“No one can imagine to pure evil and corruption out there,” Q says, “These people should be hanging.”
LUKE 8:17  For there is nothing hidden that will not be disclosed, and nothing concealed that will not be known or brought out into the open.

I started a new thread called The Age of Aquarius.
-The lyrics to this song, Adele’s Hello, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YQHsXMglC9A , woke me from sleep, and is banging around in my head even now, songs are used for words of message. If you notice, the lyrics can go both ways, God apologizing for chastening those whom THEY love, but no more, in divine essence THEY’ll. Well, like Jesus doing the last supper but only in reverse, remember Jesus said to disciples, they would not sup in this manner again, until it had its fulfillment in heaven? Bidden all to the wedding, THEY”re saying goodbye, only now the heavens will rejoice, as the earth instead mourn, so believe apostle, this is goodbye, for a while anyway, like a predicted, seven years of it, on to phenomena celebrations of glorification, wedding suppers and promised mansions in heaven. see Rev. 19.
-Unthinkable, but as so, these lyrics, it’s those pending tribulation saints now trying to get through, trying to repent to God, but now that Christ the Church Age is over, now that the Guardian Angels to the Royal Priesthood, the Righteous Bride are heard no more at all upon the earth. I know, it’s like they can’t, but they can, beware, it’s why it’s been promised, that whosoever shall call upon Jesus’ name, shall be saved, God’s promises never fade, fail or return void, Apostle John witness THEM enter in as a number that could not be numbered, remember? In hindsight, one of the reminder of rapture when the Bride is unknowingly, like the Hawaii missile threat, it is then being threaten, was right before the Chernobyl Nuclear Plant disaster, I was, well I was messing and moving about my kitchen, 2011.
-It was then like other times, I begin to hear in my ear, and I quote, “soon, the church bride could be in heaven, looking down upon and praying for the tribulation saints, as the antichrist is given power to overcome them,” As a reigning Jesus is said to intercede God’s throne for the saints. I didn’t realize it immediately, not only did THEY referenced HER as the ‘Church-bride,’ the Holy Spirit was placing the Bride in heaven doing great tribulation, one of the mightiest debates about this earth, next will a conspiracy along an alien invasion. Though also here reminding her, HER reign in heaven as of Christ, would be to intercede God’s Throne, for the Tribulation Saints, something remarkably lovesuffering,  I in hindsight of visions, dreams, demonstrations and visitations portray by my book characters, here, http://2017thelightofnebewe.blogspot.com/2017/12/i-will-put-none-of-these-diseases-upon.html and here, http://2017thelightofnebewe.blogspot.com/2017/12/it-was-when-bright-sunshine.html , beware, Apb, The RAM, see entire blog here, http://cometotoderickandoceanaescape18.blogspot.com/2018/01/prophecy-link-lyrics-to-this-song-woke.html
